name: 萨曼莎·霍夫斯
name_full: 萨曼莎·霍夫斯 Samantha Hoopes
birth_place: 美国,宾夕法尼亚州,多伊尔斯敦

last_movies.title: 体育画报：从沙子到空间：SI泳装2014年制作

introduction: Hoopes was born in Pennsylvania. She is the youngest of five sisters. She went to Barbizon Performing Arts Academy studying modeling and acting. She then attended Penn State University and majored in business after changing her major from kinesiology.
